<<<<<<< HEAD
[A proclamation declaring our purpose] England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
1 broadside.
By Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill, Imprinted at York : 1642.
Bracketed title information suggested by Wing. "Given at our court at Beverley the eighth day of July, in the eighteenth yeer of our reign. 1642." Imperfect: original printed as a broadside in two sheets; first sheet lacking. Best copy available for photographing. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Imperfect: original printed as a broadside in two sheets; first sheet lacking. Best copy available for photographing. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
